job_tasks.justification: AI agents are complex systems that often involve fine-tuning and orchestrating models, which falls under the 'Modeling' umbrella.

job_tasks.phrase: Integreren van machine learning-modellen en NLP-technologie in de bestaande softwareoplossingen van KWEEKERS
job_tasks.justification: This phrase clearly describes the act of embedding AI technologies into existing software, a core Software Development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Integreren van machine learning-modellen en NLP-technologie
job_tasks.justification: Integrating machine learning and NLP models directly relates to the application and adaptation of models, fitting the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Experimenteren met cutting-edge technologieën zoals GPT-modellen, LangChain en LangGraph
job_tasks.justification: Experimenting with LLMs (GPT-modellen) and associated frameworks (LangChain, LangGraph) is directly related to the development and exploration of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: implementeren van AI-agents die bedrijfsprocessen automatiseren en optimaliseren
job_tasks.justification: While the primary focus is agent development, the implementation and optimization of these agents to automate business processes implies data handling and pipeline considerations, fitting within Data Engineering aspects.

soft_skills.phrase: Meewerken aan het opbouwen van AI-expertise binnen KWEEKERS

classification.rationale: The job description strongly emphasizes developing and implementing AI agents using cutting-edge generative technologies like GPT models, LangChain, and LangGraph. The focus on integrating these models into software solutions and experimenting with them aligns perfectly with the 'GenAI Engineer' profile's core responsibilities.
